name: app-role-task
description: This task allows for app roles to be created on a given app registration on Azure

scripts.bumpversion: cross-var node ../version.js -v $npm_package_version && cross-var node ../version.js -v $npm_package_version -d ../Tasks/app-role-task/task.json -p version.Major -p version.Minor -p version.Patch -s
scripts.setversion: cross-var node ../version.js -v $npm_package_version -i false -d ../Tasks/app-role-task/task.json -p version.Major -p version.Minor -p version.Patch -s
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run setversion && copyfiles package.json "dist/**/*.js" -e "dist/tests/*" ../Tasks/app-role-task && cd ../Tasks/app-role-task && npm install --only=prod && cd ../../app-role-task
scripts.publish: npm run bumpversion && npm run pack
scripts.start: npm run build && INPUT_SAMPLESTRING='Human' node dist/index.js

author: eduardo.lima@dtidigital.com.br
